rules.member.devices.no.title: No devices connected
rules.member.devices.no.desc: Your kid doesn’t have a device connected to their Safe Family profile. Your kid’s protection rules won’t work until your kid’s device is connected.

rules.member.apps.desc: Decide which apps your kid can access.

rules.member.web.title: Web rules
rules.member.web.desc: Set rules for websites by category or by specific site.
rules.member.web.categories.title: Website types
rules.member.web.categories.desc: Decide the type of websites your kid can access. For example, you can allow or block all websites in games.
rules.member.web.websites.title: Specific websites
rules.member.web.websites.desc: Allow or block specific websites. These override the rules you’ve set for website types. For example, you can give your kid access to only a specific website in games.
rules.member.screentimer.title: Screen time rules
rules.member.screentimer.desc: Set rules for how much screen time your kid can have across all devices.
rules.member.screentimer.rules.title: Protect with screen time rules
rules.member.screentimer.rules.desc: Decide how much screen time your kid can have, and when they can use their device. For example, you can give access 8 am - 8 pm on weekdays.
rules.member.screentimeBlock.limit.day: You’ve reached your screen time limit for the day.
rules.member.screentimeBlock.blockedDevi: You’re blocked from accessing apps or websites right now.
rules.member.screentimeBlock.askPermissi: Feel free to ask for more time.
rules.member.screentimeBlock.askForPermi: Feel free to ask for permission.

rules.web.sites.title: Specific websites
rules.web.sites.empty.title: Come here to allow or block specific websites for your kid.
rules.web.sites.empty.desc: These sites always override the website types. For example, you can block websites in games, but allow only www.games.disney.com.

rules.web.sites.delete.desc: If you change your mind later, you’ll need to add it again.

enteremail.title: Enter your email
enteremail.description: Let's start with your email. Then you'll add your kids, devices, and set some rules.
forgotpassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotpassword.description: We'll send a password-reset link to the email you used when you set up your Intel Security or McAfee account.
forgotpassword.popup.title: Help is on the way!
forgotpassword.popup.description: We sent a link to reset your password to {{email}}
login.title: Existing Intel Security or McAfee user
login.header.title: Just enter your password to get going.
login.header.description: You’ll use this password to switch users and to ensure only you can change your kid’s protection rules.
login.reset.title: Set your password
login.reset.email.label: We emailed you a link to set your password:
login.reset.header.title: Looks like you have an Intel Security or McAfee account, but you haven't set your password yet.
login.reset.password.label: After you’ve set it, come back and enter your password here.
login.suscription.generic.error.message: Sorry about that. Want to try again?
login.suscription.generic.error.title: Oops, something went wrong.
login.topbox.description: Enter your password, and we will use your McAfee account as your Family Circle Login
login.topbox.header: Hi again — Looks like you have a McAfee account!
login.existing.title: You already have a family
login.existing.header.title: Want to log in now?
login.existing.button: Log in to my existing family
login.sync.title: You already have an account
login.sync.header.description: Good news — you already have an Intel Security or McAfee account! Enter this password now to switch profiles and to make sure only you can change your kid’s protection rules.
signup.title: Create your password
signup.header.description: This password lets you switch users and ensures only you can change your kid’s protection rules.
signup.password.note: Your password must have 8-32 characters, 1 letter and 1 number, and no special characters.
signup.topbox.description: This password lets you switch users and ensures only you can change your kid’s protection rules.

mdm.welcome.title: You need to install two more files to apply any rules you set, like what your kid can see and do on their device and online.
mdm.welcome.description.text1: These files will make sure Safe Family works properly.
mdm.welcome.description.text2: After they're installed, we'll bring you back to the app.
mdm.enrollment.description: Just install these files — it won't take long — and you'll be on your way.
email_common_mcafeePhrase: McAfee is now part of Intel Security
email_welcome_subTitle: Make the digital world a safer place for your family
email_welcome_learnMore_text: Learn more about protecting your family on all of their devices
email_welcome_item1_title: Set boundaries for a safe connected world
email_welcome_item1_subItem1: View and monitor your kid's app and website usage.
email_welcome_item1_subItem3: Control screen and app usage time
email_welcome_item2_title: Collaborate with your kids to adjust access
email_welcome_item2_subItem1: Make real-time changes to rules via in-app conversations.
email_welcome_item3_title: Know where your kid is at all times.
email_welcome_item3_subItem1: Locate your kid on a map anytime for peace of mind.
email_welcome_item3_subItem2: Your kid can 'Check in' upon reaching their destination.
email_welcome_item3_subItem3: Automatically receive alerts when your kid has arrived or left a known place, like school, the park, or library.
email_kidsTemplate_download_description: Open the app, tap "Connect to Family" and when prompted, enter the below code to add {{kid_name}}’s device.
rules.template.1.description: Blocked from stuff that is sexually explicit, and stuff concerning drugs, gambling, or violence, and all social networks. Allowed to access games and search engines.
rules.template.2.description: Blocked from stuff that is sexually explicit, and stuff concerning drugs, gambling, or violence. Allowed to access games, search engines and stuff related to entertainment.
rules.template.3.description: Blocked from dating sites, drugs, gambling and stuff that’s sexually explicit. Allowed to access search engines, games, streaming, and stuff related to entertainment.
rules.template.4.description: Blocked from dating sites, drugs, gambling and stuff that’s sexually explicit. Allowed to access search engines, games, streaming and stuff related to entertainment and shopping.
